welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Altenberge, a charming German town known for its picturesque countryside and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the hidden gems this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Münster Osnabrück International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stadtlohn Vreden Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights at Stadtlohn Vreden Airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
